com.aionemu.loginserver.network.ncrypt
Class BlowfishCipher

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.loginserver.network.ncrypt.BlowfishCipher

public class BlowfishCipher
extends java.lang.Object

Blowfish Cipher - symmetric 16-round cipher, uses 64-bit blocks, 32-448 key size and key-dependend 32-bit four S-boxes

Author:
EvilSpirit
